function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Integration with local communities may lead to increased risk of contagious disease propagation","Impact":"Potential outbreak of contagious diseases among local communities and tourists","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and hygiene protocols, conduct regular health screenings, and provide healthcare education and resources","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, telemedicine, and hygiene management tools","People":"Local communities, tourists, and staff","Owner":"Local community leaders, healthcare professionals, and tourism management"}]}
